name: They Dancin
description:
They Dancin

This game is one that I wholeheartedly want to complete and expand, so I'd love for feedback if you have a minute.

They Dancin (title in progress) is a ragdoll-based brawler game where you try to knock your opponents off of the glowing white platforms into the gray abyss. Use your cycling powers to aid you in not dying.

Player 1: WASD (Ability Key: F)

Player 2: Arrows (Ability Key: Right Shift)

This game is local multiplayer. Hope you have friends!
